handleEvent

public void handleEvent(PlayerEntered event)
This method handles the player entered event. It will display the greet messages if there are any that are currently registered.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class TWBotExtension
Parameters:
event - this is the PlayerEntered event.

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(PlayerDeath event)
This method handles the player death event. It will display the target messages if a target player is killed.

handleEvent in class TWBotExtension
Parameters:
event - this is the PlayerEntered event.
